about_the_game:
Balium is a free to play, 4 player shared/Large multiplayer online, isometric , top down shooter.

Players are given 4 guns at choice, each with fire and alt fire modes.

Moving around is much more robust than most top-down shooters that are similar, since we have jump, double jump, and doge in place.
Local shared screen mode is a work in progress, so results early on can vary.
Especally with controllers/joysticks.
Online experience may vary depending on connection speed, server load, and features being developed.
Since t his game is a work in progress, it can change and become unstable at times.
We love input on any community requests for features/nerfs/boosts or anything else that generally annoys you.

short_description: We are now going into open beta, free to play. This is a 5 year long project by 1 developer. Local 4 player shared screen and Controller support is still early, and results may vary. Internet play has been added, and offers different modes of play like battle royal, timed, etc..
